name: ( very old)Balloon Buoyancy
description:
This is an old version.

Press this for the latest one:

nawaf.itch.io/balloon-tcaf

-----

I am leaving this up here for reference.

Was trying to make a co-op game that used mass and torque.

Inflate or deflate the balloons to make the platform buoyant or heavy.

Jump up to create momentum. Remember, the sides count.

Balance yourself with a friend to try to get to the top.

Careful of the space debris. It can knock you off real good.

Comments and suggestions welcome.
